title: Customer Churn Prediction
description: Built a machine learning model to predict customer churn with 92% accuracy using XGBoost and deployed as a Flask API.

title: Automated Data Pipeline
description: Created an automated ETL pipeline with Airflow that processes 1M+ records daily from multiple sources to a data warehouse.

title: Sentiment Analysis Dashboard
description: Real-time sentiment analysis of Twitter data with NLP and visualization dashboard using Plotly Dash.

title: Recommendation System
description: Content-based recommendation engine for e-commerce products using cosine similarity and collaborative filtering.

title: Computer Vision for Quality Control
description: Implemented a CNN model to detect manufacturing defects with 96% accuracy using TensorFlow.

title: Automated Report Generation
description: Script that automatically generates and emails PDF reports from database queries using Python and LaTeX.
